## interface_AlertApi
Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/alert.ts:17](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/alert.ts#L17)

Represents the API for an alert component.

### Methods

#### close

> **close**(): `void`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:118](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L118)

Triggers alert closing programmatically (same as clicking on the close button (×)).

##### Returns

`void`

***

#### open

> **open**(): `void`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:123](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L123)

Triggers the alert to be displayed for the user.

##### Returns

`void`

## interface_AlertDirectives
Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/alert.ts:21](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/alert.ts#L21)

Represents the directives for an alert component.

### Properties

#### transitionDirective

> **transitionDirective**: [`Directive`](../types#directive)

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:133](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L133)

the transition directive, piloting what is the visual effect of going from hidden to visible

## interface_AlertProps
Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/alert.ts:13](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/alert.ts#L13)

Represents the properties for the alert component.

### Properties

#### animated

> **animated**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:108](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L108)

If `true`, alert closing will be animated.

Animation is triggered  when clicked on the close button (×),
via the `.close()` function or the visible prop is changed

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### animatedOnInit

> **animatedOnInit**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:99](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L99)

If `true`, alert opening will be animated.

Animation is triggered  when the `.open()` function is called
or the visible prop is changed

##### Default Value

`false`

***

#### ariaCloseButtonLabel

> **ariaCloseButtonLabel**: `string`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:32](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L32)

Accessibility close button label

##### Default Value

`'Close'`

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`

Defined in: [core/src/components/commonProps.ts:10](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/commonProps.ts#L10)

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### dismissible

> **dismissible**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:19](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L19)

If `true`, alert can be dismissed by the user.
The close button (×) will be displayed and you can be notified of the event with the (close) output.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### onHidden

> **onHidden**: () => `void`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:67](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L67)

Callback called when the alert is hidden.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onShown

> **onShown**: () => `void`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:77](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L77)

Callback called when the alert is shown.

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### onVisibleChange

> **onVisibleChange**: (`visible`) => `void`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:57](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L57)

Callback called when the alert visibility changed.

##### Parameters

###### visible

`boolean`

##### Returns

`void`

##### Default Value

```ts
() => {}
```

***

#### transition

> **transition**: [`TransitionFn`](../services/transitions/baseTransitions#transitionfn)

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:89](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L89)

The transition function will be executed when the alert is displayed or hidden.

Depending on the value of `animatedOnInit`, the animation can be optionally skipped during the showing process.

##### Default Value

```ts
async () => {}
```

***

#### visible

> **visible**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:25](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L25)

If `true` the alert is visible to the user

##### Default Value

`true`

## interface_AlertState
Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/alert.ts:8](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/alert.ts#L8)

Represents the state of an alert component.

### Properties

#### ariaCloseButtonLabel

> **ariaCloseButtonLabel**: `string`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:32](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L32)

Accessibility close button label

##### Default Value

`'Close'`

***

#### className

> **className**: `string`

Defined in: [core/src/components/commonProps.ts:10](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/commonProps.ts#L10)

CSS classes to be applied on the widget main container

##### Default Value

`''`

***

#### dismissible

> **dismissible**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:19](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L19)

If `true`, alert can be dismissed by the user.
The close button (×) will be displayed and you can be notified of the event with the (close) output.

##### Default Value

`true`

***

#### hidden

> **hidden**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:42](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L42)

Is `true` when the alert is hidden. Compared to `visible`, this is updated after the transition is executed.

***

#### visible

> **visible**: `boolean`

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/common.ts:25](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/common.ts#L25)

If `true` the alert is visible to the user

##### Default Value

`true`

## type alias_AlertWidget
> **AlertWidget**: [`Widget`](../types#widget)\<[`AlertProps`](#alertprops), [`AlertState`](#alertstate), [`AlertApi`](#alertapi), [`AlertDirectives`](#alertdirectives)\>

Defined in: [core/src/components/alert/alert.ts:25](https://github.com/AmadeusITGroup/AgnosUI/blob/ad84dee0db69751bb15f98666ddd98ea065c3f05/core/src/components/alert/alert.ts#L25)

Represents an alert widget with specific properties, state, API, and directives.
